about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack for Invincible Presents: Atom Eve! This soundtrack includes 17 tracks by Milk & Bone, including the title track, main menu, combat, and ambient BGM.

Invincible Presents: Atom Eve is the first original Invincible game from Skybound Games, the creator-led company behind Invincible and The Walking Dead. Experience an original story with striking art directed by Rossi Gifford and creative direction by award-winning writer Jill Murray, and explore the life of Atom Eve in a world filled with beloved characters.

Experience an original story with striking art directed by Rossi Gifford and creative direction by award-winning writer Jill Murray, and explore the life of Atom Eve in a world filled with beloved characters.
